quote: I’m not gonna run away, I never go back on my word. That’s my nindō: my ninja way!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: When you give up, your dreams and everything else they’re gone.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Hard work is worthless for those that don’t believe in themselves.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: In the world of shinobi, those who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
author: Kakashi Hatake

quote: A smile is the easiest way out of a difficult situation.
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: When people are protecting something truly special to them, they truly can become… as strong as they can be.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: The next generation will always surpass the previous one. It’s one of the never-ending cycles in life.
author: Kakashi Hatake

quote: It’s not the face that makes someone a monster, it’s the choices they make with their lives.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Even the strongest of opponents always has a weakness.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because you can’t gain something without sacrificing something.
author: Pain (Nagato)

quote: When you know the pain of loneliness, you will realize how important it is to be kind to others.
author: Jiraiya

quote: Power is not will, it is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: If you don’t like the hand that fate’s dealt you, fight for a new one.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Growth occurs when one goes beyond one’s limits. Realizing that is also part of training.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Man seeks peace, yet at the same time yearning for war… Those are the two realms belonging solely to man.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: A lesson learned from failure is worth more than a lesson learned from success.
author: Jiraiya

quote: Love is not something you protect, it’s something you give.
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: Rejection is a part of any man’s life. If you can’t accept and move past rejection, you’re not a real man.
author: Jiraiya

quote: When you forgive, you also heal. The one who forgives and the one who is forgiven both gain peace.
author: Nagato

quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
author: Gildarts (fandom crossover style)

quote: Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain.
author: Pain (Nagato)

quote: People’s lives don’t end when they die, it ends when they lose faith.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Those who forgive themselves, and are able to accept their true nature… They are the strong ones!
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Knowing what it feels like to be in pain, is exactly why we try to be kind to others.
author: Jiraiya
